${ModID}:StrikeOfMidnight.NAME: 午夜打击
${ModID}:StrikeOfMidnight.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 生成1个 黑暗 充能球。

${ModID}:StrikeOfLuck.NAME: 幸运打击
${ModID}:StrikeOfLuck.DESCRIPTION: 随机造成 !D! 点伤害1~3 次。

${ModID}:WorkersStrike.NAME: 罢工打击
${ModID}:WorkersStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 从抽牌堆取出一张攻击，若为一张打击牌，获得 [E] 。

${ModID}:StrikeDummyJr.NAME: Dummy's Strike
${ModID}:StrikeDummyJr.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Strikes deal 2 more damage this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DifferentStrikes.NAME: Different Strikes
${ModID}:DifferentStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card. Gain a random Strike that costs 1 less and Exhausts.
${ModID}:DifferentStrikes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card. Gain a random Upgraded Strike that costs 1 less and Exhausts.

${ModID}:StrikeOfGenius.NAME: Strike of Genius
${ModID}:StrikeOfGenius.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next attack you play gains 'Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt'.

${ModID}:StrikeABargain.NAME: Strike a Bargain
${ModID}:StrikeABargain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of Attacks in hand to 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:StrikeABargain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the cost of Attacks in hand to 0 until played.

${ModID}:Backstrike.NAME: Backstrike
${ModID}:Backstrike.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Attacks in hand count as *Strikes this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:LightningStrike.NAME: Lightning Strike
${ModID}:LightningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Channel 2 Lightning.

${ModID}:PenaltyStrike.NAME: Penalty Strike
${ModID}:PenaltyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.
